item.description:
Hi All...

People have been bugging/asking me for awhile on when I was going to put together an happy hour. So without further delay... Our first ever happy hour is upon us. Let's meet at 6:30PM at:

21st Amendment (Let's meet at the bar)
150 Bowdoin St (between Freeman Pl & Mount Vernon St)
Beacon Hill Boston, MA 02108
(617) 227-7100
21stboston.com (check them out on the web)

I hope to see you at the 21st Amendment!

Cheers,
Michael
PS- For those of you who need to brush up on your US History/Constitutional Law. The Twenty-first Amendment (Amendment XXI) to the United States Constitution repealed the Eighteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, which had mandated nationwide Prohibition.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Our First Ever Happy Hour!
